Title: Pilot
Plot: While the Strike Team ramps up their control of the streets, David tried to crack corruption in the Barn by recruiting Terry to help him take down Vic, only to result in Terry's death.  Meanwhile, Dutch and Claudette investigate the murder of Nancy Reborg only to discover her missing daughter has been sold off by her addict father to a child molester.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Kenny Johnson, Tamlyn Tomita, Jim Ortlieb, Max Perlich, Ricki Lopez, Michael Reid MacKay, Jamie Brown
